name: User-Authentication
description: This project leverages Node.js and Express for the backend, ensuring efficient server-side operations. MySQL is employed for secure and reliable data storage. The front-end interface is rendered using the Handlebars (HBS) view engine, providing a seamless and dynamic user experience.

name: Chat App
description: This project is use for communication between users. It is a real time chat application. It is a simple chat application that allows users to send and receive messages in real time. The application is built using Node.js, Express, and Socket.io.
